definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: make blind, blind (orig. meaning of √ dub.; Thes [[עור]] = dig (Ar. ga0run etc. cave); Hal:RÉJ xi, 67 cp. [[עוֹר]] skin, whence blindness as cataract;—Aram. adj. [[עֲוִיר]], 9wir blind, Pa. [[עַוַּר]], 9yt. = Heb. Pi.; Ar. 9awira be one-eyed, Eth. 9ora: be blind Di:995);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עִוֵּר]] 2Ki 25:7, c. [[עֵינֵי]] put out the eyes of = Je 39:7 = Je 52:11; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְעַוֵּר]] fig., Ex 23:8 (E) a bribe blindeth, c.acc. pers. (Sam LXX ins. [[עֵינֵי]]); De 16:19, c. [[עֵינֵי]].
